title: Hextech Box
body: I became lvl 5 but i didn't got the hextech box that you get when they first released please help!

replies.body: I'm seeing one in your account right now :D Could have been slightly delayed, but go ahead and check your crafting inventory and let me know if you still can't see it
Oh i finally got it thank you for checking!By the way i have a sec account and didnt got rp there!
